name: Hie Hue
description:
Hie Hue is a color-switching platformer with tones of Wipeout and fast paced decision making!

This is a game created during the 1 Week 2022 Goodbye Summer Game Jam.

The theme was Transition - For this game the transition was Red to Blue.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Jump: Spacebar
  • Right Mouse Button: Switch to Blue
  • Left Mouse Button: Switch to Red

Goal: Make it to the end of the level (Green Pad) by transitioning red to blue and navigating the platforms. If you touch one of the platforms as the opposing color, you will short circuit!
